admin_acknowledge_modal_context: You're logged in as an admin to this wallet. Note that the configuration for other user groups might be different. If you're testing the end-user experience it is recommended to create a new user account by registering as a user.
tap_to_complete_onboarding: Tap the banner to complete your onboarding
documents_pending_subtitle: Your onboarding documents are pending review
onboarding_failed_subtitle: Tap the banner to reupload your **verification document**
crypto_address_setup_description: Fill in your wallet address to withdraw funds
